long_desc.thetext: It is possible to change the color of the border of action nodes. This also changes the border of ActivityLinkNodes (good!) and of Split-, Initial-, Final- and JoinNodes (good!), but not of DecisionNodes (bad!) and MergeNodes (bad!). Please change that the color of these is also adapted. Additionally it would be nice to select the FillColor of ActionNodes and ActivityLinkNodes (e.g. to yellow), so that these could be filled with an arbitrary colour.

Since the border of Decision- and MergeNodes is created using Draw2D setting the foreground color will also affect these node types. Additionally, an option to set the shadow color and the background color of the editor has been added. What remains is: - maybe separate foreground color to bordercolor and textcolor, so that they can be set independently (if possible) - add an option to set the backgroundcolor/fillcolor of activitynodes
It is now possible to set the: - Text color - Fill color - Border color - Shadow color - Editor background color - Guard color
I think that this bug can be closed. If you have another request concerning the color configuration, please reopen.
